name: build_query
types table
template:
{
    "t": { "title": "temp", 
           "icon": "fa-thermometer-1", 
           "color": "w3-red", 
           "unit": "Â°C",
           "linestyle": "stroke:#f44336; stroke-width: 3; fill:none;",
           "areastyle": "fill:#f44336; fill-opacity:.1; stroke: none;",
           "tickstyle": "stroke:grey; stroke-width: 1; fill:none;",
           "scale": [0, 60]
    },
    "h": { "title": "humidity", 
           "icon": "fa-cloud", 
           "color": "w3-blue", 
           "unit": "%",
           "linestyle": "stroke:#2196F3; stroke-width: 3; fill:none;",
           "areastyle": "fill:#2196F3; fill-opacity:.1; stroke: none;",
           "tickstyle": "stroke:grey; stroke-width: 1; fill:none;",
           "scale": [0, 100]
    },
    "l": { "title": "luminance", 
           "icon": "fa-sun-o", 
           "color": "w3-green", 
           "unit": "lx", 
           "linestyle": "stroke:#4CAF50; stroke-width: 3; fill:none;",
           "areastyle": "fill:#4CAF50; fill-opacity:.1; stroke: none;",
           "tickstyle": "stroke:grey; stroke-width: 1; fill:none;",
           "scale": [0, 3000]
    }
}

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>

        <title>iocp</title>
        <meta charset="UTF-8">
        <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">

        <style>

                height: 150px;
                width: 150px;
            }
        </style>
    </head>

    <body ng-app="app" ng-controller="main" class="w3-light-grey">

        <svg id="summary"></svg>


    </body>

</html>
